channel.title: No sound
channel.description: So my computer just randomly stopped producing volume. It wont come out of my speakers, nothing is on mute or off. And i plugged in my headphoens and i still cant hear... any way to reset to default or a quick fix? thanks

item.title: No sound
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Right click volume thing in task bar, troubleshoot problems. As shit as that feature normally is in Windows, it has fixed it a few times for me so it’s worth a try.

Read full topic

item.title: No sound
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Try a different operating system (download Ubuntu and do the ‘trial’ instead of installing it). It’s probably a Windows issue. Check all sound settings (example your keyboard mute button) and make sure to check your control panel sound settings.

If not maybe you could try something like this: http://www.ebay.com/itm/280924751343 (or not[size=1pt], I bought this hoping it would work with my xbox and it doesn’t, so I need to sell it. PM me if you want to buy it and I’ll sell it to you for a price cheaper than that[/size]).

Read full topic

item.title: No sound
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

check out your physical sound card maybe update drivers make sure you did not turn anything off. also a virus or malware could do this. first check if different speakers work?

Read full topic
